result.purpose: This folder is responsible for managing Docker containers for various services (Kafka, PostgreSQL, Redis) used in testing environments.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file encapsulates the logic for managing a specific type of Docker container.

pkg/docker/helper.go.purpose: Provides a function to find an available TCP port on localhost.

pkg/docker/kafka.go.purpose: This file provides functionality to create and manage a Kafka container using Testcontainers.

pkg/docker/postgres.go.purpose: Manages a PostgreSQL database container for testing purposes using Docker.

pkg/docker/redis.go.purpose: This file manages a Redis container using Testcontainers for integration testing.
